General.Name: Digitree Group S.A
General.Description: Digitree Group S.A. provides advertising services in Poland. The company offers contact leads generation and verification, strategic consulting, digital marketing, telemarketing, legal advice, databases and WWW monetization, creation and copy, SEO, e-commerce implementation, mailing, mobile, influence, and display campaigns. It also provides SAREsystem, which is used to conduct integrated and targeted communication through e-mail and mobile channels; and SAREhub system that collects and analyses user data in one location, which enables integrated and multi-channel communication activities. The company was formerly known as SARE S.A. Digitree Group S.A. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Rybnik, Poland. The company operates as a subsidiary of Polinvest 7 S.a.r.l.
